pageContext.claim: “If you look at that phony report that was put in, that report on the hydroxyl -- was given to people that were in extraordinarily bad condition -- extraordinarily bad, people that were dying....But they had a report come out and the results of the report -- it was a very unscientific report, by the way.”
pageContext.analysis: There was nothing unscientific about the retrospective analysis conducted by the U.S. Veterans Health Administration, which found increased mortality was observed in patients treated with hydroxychloroquine. Trump just did not like the conclusion, which echoed other reports on the drug he had touted.
